long_description:
### Description
Fork of TX_Miner's [Horror](https://content.luanti.org/packages/TX_Miner/horror/) mod, but with adding a lot of sounds, mobs and mechanics.
### Information
1. **Campfire**: Campfire is a new node in Horror mod. Near the campfire in 6 blocks, at night time none of the sound or mob will spawn. At day time it will just prevent cave sounds. Crafts from *3 any logs at the bottom* and *1 coal lump in the center*.
2. **Reaper**: Skeleton in black raincoat, after spawn have a chance to kill player.
3. **Chaser**: Monster, which chases player until he won't tag and kill him.
4. **The Entity**: Spawns far from the player and coming to him, until he dies.
5. **Shadow**: Will watch the player at the distance of 32 blocks. If player touches him, player dies.
6. **Girl**: Little girl doesn't do anything until player punch her.
7. **Dead Sam**: Doesn't hurt the player by himself, until player doesn't close enough or punches Dead Sam.
* And one more Extra Monster!
name: horror_fork
short_description: Fork of TX_Miner's Horror mod, but heavy modified with adding a lot of additional stuff.
title: Horror: Rescared
